metadata.Title: CVE-2011-1285 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The regular-expression functionality in Google Chrome before 10.0.648.127 does not properly implement reentrancy, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) or possibly have unspecified other impact via unknown vectors.

notes.Note: mikesalvatore> The Ubuntu Security Team does not support libv8

criterions.comment: libv8-3.14: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
